Text: This is crap. Not kidding. This is poor comedy. He must be on drugs this guy. Not funny. Crap! Waste of time.

Forget the haters. Denis Leary is the shit. Yes he looks like he is on dope or something, and look like shit ;-). But what the hell...You shit in your pants of laugh. He have the the full attention of the audience....and they shit in their pants of laugh.
Saw some Bill Hicks on youtube. HA HA HA! Not funny IMHO. He does'nt have the anarchistic/chaotic/crazy kind of touch of humor on the stage.....Face it. Download "No Cure For Cancer" & you wont be disapointed.
Short of Richard Prior and Eddy Murphy this is the funniest stand up special ever.

The point is that he smartend up and does very well for himself. Don't forget; this stand up is almost 20 years old. WORTH THE DOWNLOAD!! 100%.
